text:
Clojure/ClojureScript | goskive.com | Berlin, Germany | Full-time

We're looking for Clojure/ClojureScript programmers that can handle both sides of the stack. Our team of 3 engineers (disregarding the mobile developers) need someone to help us implement new features and services.

You will preferably have experience in Clojure, as you'll be leading the way as we transition away from Node!

We can help with working VISAs and to an extent relocation as well.

If you like the idea of our product and joining a small team of engineers with lots of opportunity to take charge, then by all means send an email over to jobs @ goskive.com!

PS. First jobs post, feel free to feedback.
